synopsis.text: Aisaka Taiga, known as the Palmtop Tiger, and Takasu Ryuuji, a gentle soul with a delinquent appearance, find themselves in an unexpected alliance in their second year of high school. Despite Ryuuji's intimidating looks, he has a soft heart and a knack for domestic chores, while Taiga, despite her small stature, is feared throughout the school for her fiery personality and wooden katana. Both have crushes on each other's best friends - Ryuuji has feelings for the lively Kushieda Minori, while Taiga harbors affections for the amiable Kitamura Yuusaku. In a twist of fate, Taiga takes Ryuuji as her personal servant due to her inability to manage household chores. As they spend more time together, they decide to help each other win over their respective crushes. However, their unusual relationship sparks curiosity and rumors among their classmates. Will their plan succeed, or will their feelings for each other's friends - or perhaps for each other - complicate matters? Join this unlikely duo in their comedic and heartwarming journey of love, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
